import React, { useState } from 'react'; import './Product.css'; const ProductMoisturizer: React.FC = () => { const [selectedOption, setSelectedOption] = useState<'onetime' | 'subscribe'>('subscribe'); const [showBenefits, setShowBenefits] = useState(false); const [showIngredients, setShowIngredients] = useState(false); const benefits = [ 'Biomimetic tallow technology mimics natural skin lipids', 'Lightweight, fast-absorbing formula', 'Strengthens skin\'s protective barrier', 'Suitable for both AM and PM use', 'Rich in vitamins A, D, E, and K', 'Comprehensive Natural Moisturizing Factor (NMF) complex', 'Regulates oil production with Niacinamide', 'Silicone-free with natural alternatives' ]; const keyIngredients = [ { name: 'Beef Tallow', description: 'The signature biomimetic occlusive. Rich in skin-compatible fatty acids and vitamins A, D, E, & K, it provides unparalleled barrier support and nourishment with a lipid profile remarkably similar to human sebum.' }, { name: 'Ceramide NP', description: 'A crucial skin-identical ceramide that reinforces the skin\'s natural barrier, locking in moisture and protecting against environmental stressors.' }, { name: 'Niacinamide (Vitamin B3)', description: 'A versatile active that helps regulate sebum, reduce inflammation, minimize the appearance of pores, and improve overall skin tone.' }, { name: 'Comprehensive NMF Complex', description: 'A blend of powerful humectants including Sodium PCA, amino acids, and other components that mimic the skin\'s own hydration system for deep, cellular moisture.' } ]; const fullIngredientList = 'Water, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Cetearyl Olivate, Glycerin, Sorbitan Olivate, Squalane, Methylheptylglycerin, Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Oil, Tallow, Ceramide NP, Diheptyl Succinate, Sodium PCA, Betaine, Sodium Lactate, PCA, Fructose, Serine, Glycine, Alanine, Niacinamide, Glutamic Acid, Urea, Lysine HCL, Inositol, Threonine, Caprylhydroxamic Acid, Capryloyl Glycerin/Sebacic Acid Copolymer, Caprylyl Glycol, Arginine, Proline, Xanthan Gum, Sodium Phytate.'; return (
{/* Product Images */}
[FACE MOISTURIZER WITH BEEF TALLOW BOTTLE - MAIN IMAGE]

High-quality product photography showing the moisturizer bottle

{/* Product Information */}

Face Moisturizer with Beef Tallow

1.7 FL OZ / 50 ML

This lightweight, fast-absorbing moisturizer is the hero product of our lineup, showcasing Rawdog's unique blend of ancestral wisdom and modern science. Formulated to provide deep, lasting hydration and robust barrier support without a greasy residue, making it ideal for both AM and PM use.

{/* Benefits Section */}
{showBenefits && (
    {benefits.map((benefit, index) => (
  • {benefit}
    • ))}
)}
{/* Key Ingredients Section */}
{showIngredients && (
{keyIngredients.map((ingredient, index) => (

{ingredient.name}

{ingredient.description}

))}

Full Ingredient List (INCI):

{fullIngredientList}

)}
{/* Reviews */}
REVIEWS
★★★★★ 203 Reviews
{/* Purchase Options */}
{/* Bundle Offer */}
[PRODUCT BUNDLE IMAGE]

Three product bundle

MAKE IT A BUNDLE

SAVE 15%

{/* How to Use Section */}

HOW TO USE

01

CLEANSE FIRST

Start with clean skin using our Hydrating Facial Cleanser for optimal absorption.

02

APPLY TO FACE

Dispense a small amount and gently massage into face and neck using upward motions.

03

LAYER OR FINISH

Use alone or layer under sunscreen in AM. Perfect as a final step in PM routine.

{/* The Science of Tallow */}

THE SCIENCE OF TALLOW

Biomimetic Lipid Technology

Beef tallow's lipid profile is remarkably similar to human sebum, containing a balanced ratio of saturated and unsaturated fatty acids, plus cholesterol - all critical components of a healthy skin barrier.

When applied, the skin recognizes these lipids as its own, allowing them to be readily integrated into the stratum corneum to patch up weaknesses, prevent transepidermal water loss (TEWL), and restore resilience.

Superior to Plant Oils

Unlike many plant-based oils or petroleum-derived ingredients that can sit on the skin's surface, tallow's compatibility with human skin structure ensures superior absorption and barrier repair without clogging pores.

Why Tallow Works:

  • Contains vitamins A, D, E, and K naturally
  • Fatty acid profile matches human sebum
  • Superior absorption and barrier integration
  • Non-comedogenic despite being an animal fat
  • Provides lasting hydration without greasiness
[TALLOW VS HUMAN SEBUM COMPARISON CHART]

Scientific comparison showing lipid profile similarities

{/* Customer Reviews */}

WHAT CUSTOMERS SAY

★★★★★

Skeptical at First, Now a Convert

"I was hesitant about tallow in skincare, but this moisturizer is incredible. Absorbs quickly, no greasy feeling, and my skin looks healthier than it has in years. The texture is perfect."

- Alex M., Verified Buyer
★★★★★

Perfect for Combination Skin

"Finally found a moisturizer that hydrates my dry areas without making my T-zone oily. Been using it for 4 months and my skin barrier feels stronger than ever."

- Ryan K., Verified Buyer
★★★★★

Game Changer for Sensitive Skin

"I have reactive skin and most moisturizers either don't hydrate enough or cause breakouts. This one does neither - just pure, effective hydration with zero irritation."

- Michael T., Verified Buyer
{/* Ingredient Deep Dive */}

INGREDIENT DEEP DIVE

Natural Moisturizing Factor (NMF) Complex

Our moisturizer contains a comprehensive NMF complex that precisely replicates the NMF found naturally within skin cells. This complex doesn't just hydrate the surface; it replenishes the skin's own water-binding capacity from within.

Amino Acids

Serine, Glycine, Alanine, and others - the building blocks of proteins that maintain skin hydration and texture.

Humectants

Sodium PCA, Sodium Lactate, and Urea work together to bind water molecules to skin cells.

Osmolytes

Betaine and Inositol help maintain cellular water balance and protect against environmental stress.

{/* Related Products */}

COMPLETE YOUR ROUTINE

[CLEANSER IMAGE]

Cleanser product shot

Hydrating Facial Cleanser

$32.00

[EYE CREAM IMAGE]

Eye cream product shot

Caffeine Under Eye Cream

$38.00

); }; export default ProductMoisturizer;
